org.madsenlab.sim.tf.interfaces
Interface ITraitStatisticsObserver<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ITraitStatisticsObserver<T>

CLASS DESCRIPTION

User: mark Date: Aug 8, 2010 Time: 11:52:21 AM

Method Summary
 void endSimulationAction()
          Should be called by the simulation model after the end of the simulation run, but before the observer is "finalized." This is the appropriate place to do I/O intensive operations that would slow things down, like writing the history of statistics to a log file or into a database.
 void finalizeObservation()
          finalizeObservation should be implemented by any observer which has file or network output that might need to be flushed prior to ending a simulation run.
 void perStepAction()
          Should be called by the simulation model after every time step.
 void updateTraitStatistics(ITraitStatistic<T> stat)
          Called automatically by the publisher of the statistic being observed
 

Method Detail

updateTraitStatistics

void updateTraitStatistics(ITraitStatistic<T> stat)
Called automatically by the publisher of the statistic being observed

Parameters:
stat -

perStepAction

void perStepAction()
Should be called by the simulation model after every time step. Observers may choose to make some calculation or type of output on a per-time-step basis. If an observer does so, the author should consider the operations carefully so as to create minimal impact on simulation performance. It's simply not necessary to write data to files synchronously in each step, and it really slows down performance. On the other hand, making a simple derived calculation and stashing the result with a time index is useful and low impact, and that's what this is intended for.

endSimulationAction

void endSimulationAction()
Should be called by the simulation model after the end of the simulation run, but before the observer is "finalized." This is the appropriate place to do I/O intensive operations that would slow things down, like writing the history of statistics to a log file or into a database.

finalizeObservation

void finalizeObservation()
finalizeObservation should be implemented by any observer which has file or network output that might need to be flushed prior to ending a simulation run.
